name: Core Enforcer
description: You send a focused laser that scorches a 'Z' pattern on a target. Make a ranged attack, dealing 4d4 + MOVE dragon damage on a hit. On a hit, force the target to make a CON save against your Move DC, losing all effects of its abilities on a failure, until it is switched out.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
